channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 民主党控制的参议院为通过一项旨在加强乌克兰、以色列和其他盟国的法案扫清了关键障碍
item.description: The Democratic-controlled Senate cleared a critical hurdle toward passing a bill aimed at fortifying Ukraine, Israel and other allies on.wsj.com/42AeiMz on.wsj.com/42AeiMz

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.
item.description: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.’s human-resources operation has an HR problem: The two departments charged with addressing employees’ complaints of harassment and discrimination have long been beset by their own allegations of misconduct on.wsj.com/49uEzhU

item.title: 拉斯维加斯转变为全球体育中心，反映了沙特阿拉伯为提升其全球形象而掀起的体育狂潮
item.description: The transformation of Las Vegas into a global sports hub mirrors the sports-fueled binge that Saudi Arabia has used to enhance its global profile on.wsj.com/3Ux6Lw2 on.wsj.com/3Ux6Lw2

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）已经取缔了由人工智能发出声音的未经请求的机器人电话，因为人们越来越担心这种技术会被用来欺骗或误导他人。
item.description: The FCC has outlawed unsolicited robocalls with voices generated by artificial intelligence amid growing concerns the technology can be used to deceive or mislead people on.wsj.com/3OD8zjl on.wsj.com/3OD8zjl

item.title: 重大新闻：乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）罢免了他的高级将领，这是乌克兰领导层自俄罗斯入侵以来最重大的一次调整
item.description: Breaking: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky ousted his top general in the most significant shake-up of the country’s leadership since the Russian invasion began on.wsj.com/3uoaJwz on.wsj.com/3uoaJwz

item.title: 美国无人机空袭炸死了一名伊朗支持的伊拉克民兵指挥官，有可能进一步恶化与巴格达的关系
item.description: The U.S. drone strike that killed an Iran-backed militia commander in Iraq risks further straining relations with Baghdad on.wsj.com/3SR63IS on.wsj.com/3SR63IS

item.title: 长期以来，移民政治一直是国会山的毒瘤，而迫在眉睫的特朗普-拜登复选更不可能达成妥协。
item.description: Immigration politics have long been toxic on Capitol Hill, and the looming Trump-Biden rematch made compromise even more unlikely. on.wsj.com/484i02k on.wsj.com/484i02k

item.title: 凯特琳-克拉克（Caitlin Clark）已接近美国大学生篮球联赛（NCAA）女子篮球职业生涯得分纪录，但一些著名教练表示，真正的纪录还没有被打破。
item.description: Caitlin Clark is close to the NCAA women’s basketball career scoring record, but some prominent coaches say the true mark is yet to be broken on.wsj.com/498THBw on.wsj.com/498THBw

item.title: 羞于进来。待在家里会蒙羞。生病的工人赢不了
item.description: Shamed for coming in. Shamed for staying home. Sick workers can’t win. on.wsj.com/489lLn1 on.wsj.com/489lLn1

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：第 14 条修正案第 3 款取消了某些 "参与叛乱 "的前公职人员的资格，该条款是否适用于总统职位？答案是否定的，@DavidRivkin 和 Lee A. Casey 写道
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Does Section 3 of the 14th Amendment, which disqualifies certain former officeholders who have “engaged in insurrection,” apply to the presidency? The answer is no, write @DavidRivkin and  Lee A. Casey on.wsj.com/3SOxqmY

item.title: 这家以超级碗体育场为名的小型廉价航空公司正悄然赢得越来越多的粉丝。乘客们说，他们喜欢这家航空公司的直飞航班，但也不得不接受其局限性。
item.description: The small budget airline with its name on the stadium hosting the Super Bowl is quietly gaining fans. Passengers say they love its nonstop flights, but they have to accept its limitations. on.wsj.com/497TT3W

item.title: 路易丝-阿伦森（Louise Aronson）和泰瓦-布伦德（Teva Brender）两位医生写道："在选择我们的领导人时，认知和身体健康很重要，但年龄本身并不重要。
item.description: In choosing our leaders, cognitive and physical health matter—but age alone shouldn’t, write doctors Louise Aronson and Teva Brender on.wsj.com/49uEFFV on.wsj.com/49uEFFV

item.title:
R to @WSJ：今年已经发布了许多星光熠熠的广告，包括由汤姆-布雷迪（Tom Brady）、文斯-沃恩（Vince Vaughn）和韦恩-格雷茨基（Wayne Gretzky）主演的 BetMGM 广告。
您最喜爱的明星在超级碗广告中亮相了吗？
item.description:
Many star-studded commercials have already been released this year, including a BetMGM ad starring Tom Brady, Vince Vaughn and Wayne Gretzky.

Has your favorite celebrity made a Super Bowl commercial appearance? on.wsj.com/3wgQiC1

item.title: R to @WSJ：在社交媒体的推动下，越来越多的品牌开始启用多位知名人士。今年的 Uber Eats 广告将邀请六位名人，包括詹妮弗-安妮斯顿、大卫-施维默、大卫-贝克汉姆和维多利亚-贝克汉姆。
item.description: Social media has driven more brands to enlist multiple well-known personalities. This year’s Uber Eats commercial will feature a half-dozen celebrities including Jennifer Aniston, David Schwimmer and David and Victoria Beckham. on.wsj.com/3wgQiC1

item.title: R to @WSJ：现在，没有名人的超级碗广告已变得非常罕见。说到超级碗的无处不在，没人能超越塞雷娜-威廉姆斯（Serena Williams）。自 2016 年以来，这位史上最伟大的网球运动员已经在超级碗广告中出现了不下七次。
item.description: Celebrity-free Super Bowl ads have now become a rarity. And when it comes to Super Bowl ubiquitousness, nobody can beat Serena Williams. The all-time tennis great has appeared in no less than seven Super Bowl commercials since 2016. on.wsj.com/3wgQiC1

item.title: 各品牌都在试探一个超级碗广告时段能挤进多少名人的极限。本周日预计也不例外。
item.description: Brands are testing the limits of how many celebrities can be squeezed into a single Super Bowl ad break. This Sunday is expected to be no different. on.wsj.com/3wgQiC1 on.wsj.com/3wgQiC1

item.title: 美国国会的一份报告称，五家美国风险投资公司向中国公司投资了数十亿美元，用于开发据称被用于侵犯人权和中国军方的技术。
item.description: Five U.S. venture-capital firms invested billions of dollars in Chinese companies developing technology allegedly used in human-rights abuses and by the Chinese military, says a Congressional report on.wsj.com/3wdIwcs on.wsj.com/3wdIwcs

item.title: 佐治亚州的一处住宅以 895 万美元的价格上市，该住宅拥有 4000 平方英尺的老西部小镇复制品。卖家是前 UPS 总裁罗恩-华莱士。
item.description: A Georgia home complete with a 4,000-square-foot replicate of an Old West town is coming on the market for $8.95 million. The seller is former UPS president Ron Wallace. on.wsj.com/3wjsAoI on.wsj.com/3wjsAoI

item.title: 阿什利-莫森特（Ashleigh Merchant）是佐治亚州的一名刑事辩护律师，她对地区检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）的关系提出了爆炸性的指控，被称为不怕掀起波澜的律师。
item.description: Ashleigh Merchant, the Georgia criminal-defense lawyer who filed a bombshell claim about District Attorney Fani Willis’s relationship, is described as unafraid to make waves on.wsj.com/3usYRcx on.wsj.com/3usYRcx

item.title: NFL和NBA被迪士尼、福克斯和华纳兄弟推出的体育流媒体服务吓了一跳。
item.description: The NFL and NBA were blindsided by the sports streaming service being launched by Disney, Fox and Warner Bros. Discovery on.wsj.com/3wcdu4z on.wsj.com/3wcdu4z

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在征集想要起诉迪士尼歧视行为的人，这是他与迪士尼及其首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）斗争的最新升级之一。
item.description: Elon Musk is soliciting people who want to sue Disney for discrimination, one of the latest escalations in his fight with Disney and its CEO Bob Iger. on.wsj.com/494UN1m

item.title: 街头智慧：@jmackin2 写道：对经济明显不受高利率影响的解释，每一种都会给市场带来完全不同的结果。
item.description: Streetwise: The explanations for the economy’s apparent immunity to high interest rates each lead to completely different outcomes for the markets, writes @jmackin2 on.wsj.com/3OxvVHh

item.title: 在预测美联储是否降息方面，投资者的记录令人遗憾
item.description: Investors have a sorry record when it comes to predicting whether the Fed will cut interest rates on.wsj.com/3Uzy1u6 on.wsj.com/3Uzy1u6

item.title: 街谈巷议迪斯尼的举措给了鲍勃-艾格一次运动的机会
item.description: Heard on the Street: Disney’s moves give Bob Iger a sporting chance on.wsj.com/3OwvInO on.wsj.com/3OwvInO

item.title: 在阿比盖尔-约翰逊（Abigail Johnson）担任首席执行官期间，富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）任命了一批新的高管担任重要的高级职务，其中包括财务总监，这是管理层最大的一次调整。
item.description: Fidelity Investments appointed a new slate of executives to key senior roles, including finance chief, in one of the biggest management reshuffles in Abigail Johnson’s run as CEO on.wsj.com/3OCE9xT on.wsj.com/3OCE9xT

item.title: 美国官员称，俄罗斯情报机构正试图通过散布虚假信息破坏美国在非洲的影响力
item.description: Russian intelligence agencies are trying to undermine U.S. influence in Africa by spreading disinformation, U.S. officials say on.wsj.com/3OAtpQw on.wsj.com/3OAtpQw

item.title: 拉斯维加斯转变为全球体育中心的过程，反映了沙特阿拉伯为提升其全球形象而掀起的体育狂潮。
item.description: The transformation of Las Vegas into a global sports hub mirrors the sports-fueled binge that Saudi Arabia has used to enhance its global profile. on.wsj.com/42ABMBw

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的律师试图将他的名字保留在科罗拉多州的选票上，最高法院将听取有关因涉嫌参与叛乱而取消总统候选人资格的争论。
item.description: The Supreme Court is set to hear arguments over disqualifying a presidential candidate for allegedly engaging in insurrection, as lawyers for Donald Trump seek to keep his name on the Colorado ballot on.wsj.com/3OwdAtV

item.title: 巴基斯坦正在进行一场考验其脆弱民主的选举，该国主要反对党的瘫痪和恐怖袭击的威胁使投票日气氛紧张
item.description: Pakistan is voting in an election that will test its fragile democracy, as the hobbling of the country’s key opposition party and the threat of terrorist attacks make for a tense day at the polls on.wsj.com/3HS6xIo on.wsj.com/3HS6xIo

item.title: 美国在伊拉克的一次空袭炸死了伊朗支持的伊拉克民兵的一名指挥官，美国称该民兵对上周在约旦基地造成三名美国人死亡的无人机袭击事件负有责任
item.description: A U.S. airstrike in Iraq killed a commander of the Iran-backed Iraqi militia that the U.S. said was responsible for a drone strike that killed three Americans at a base in Jordan last week on.wsj.com/3uq5jB4 on.wsj.com/3uq5jB4
